Message.Title: anyone else here thinks Steve Ballmer strongly resembles Uncle Fester from the Adam's Family?

Topic.Title: MSFT is becoming irrelevant. Thanks to WinDOG 8 : The killer OS that's killing MSFT.

Message.Msg: I started using W8 last week and my respect for Microsoft is near zero. Little immature boys trying to produce a serious product for the world. Mail management is a disaster. No program to download and manage all your mail in your computer. (The CLOUD is cool) I can't work with this, but what choice is there? There are many situations with the two different interfaces where it is not clear how to switch to the other. Far be it from them to explain anything. The Help section doesn't seem to have much.

Topic.Title: Microsoft Plummets On Q4 Miss, Surface Tablet Losses

Message.Msg: Does MS need a return of Bill Gates? This is like little boys trying to do men's work. I wish IBM were still in control of computers.

Message.Title: $33 tomorrow ? Earnings were not sooo bad !
